Class BabelNet

java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

getSenses

public java.util.List<BabelSense> getSenses(it.uniroma1.lcl.jlt.util.Language language,
                                            java.lang.String word)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
Given a word, returns the senses for the word. Assumes the word is a noun.

Parameters:
language - the language of the input word.
word - the word whose senses are to be retrieved.
Returns:
the senses of the word.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getSenses

public java.util.List<BabelSense> getSenses(it.uniroma1.lcl.jlt.util.Language language,
                                            java.lang.String word,
                                            edu.mit.jwi.item.POS pos,
                                            BabelSenseSource... allowedSources)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
Given a word, returns the senses for the word.

Parameters:
language - the language of the input word.
word - the word whose senses are to be retrieved.
pos - the PoS of the word.
allowedSources - the BabelSenseSources that can be used to look up the possible senses of the input word.
Returns:
the senses of the word.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getSenses

public java.util.List<BabelSense> getSenses(it.uniroma1.lcl.jlt.util.Language language,
                                            java.lang.String word,
                                            edu.mit.jwi.item.POS pos,
                                            boolean includeRedirections,
                                            BabelSenseSource... allowedSources)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
Given a word, returns the senses for the word.

Parameters:
language - the language of the input word.
word - the word whose senses are to be retrieved.
pos - the PoS of the word.
includeRedirections - whether to include synsets senses of the word which are redirections in Wikipedia.
allowedSources - the BabelSenseSources that can be used to look up the possible senses of the input word.
Returns:
the senses of the word.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getSynsets

public java.util.List<BabelSynset> getSynsets(it.uniroma1.lcl.jlt.util.Language language,
                                              java.lang.String word,
                                              edu.mit.jwi.item.POS pos,
                                              boolean includeRedirections,
                                              BabelSenseSource... allowedSources)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
Given a word, returns the senses for the word.

Parameters:
language - the language of the input word.
word - the word whose senses are to be retrieved.
pos - the PoS of the word.
includeRedirections - whether to include synsets with senses of the word which are only redirections in Wikipedia.
allowedSources - the BabelSenseSources that can be used to look up the possible senses of the input word.
Returns:
the senses of the word.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getSuccessors

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSuccessors(java.lang.String concept)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
Given a Babel id, collects the successors of the concept denoted by the id

Parameters:
concept - a concept identifier (babel synset ID)
Returns:
a stringified representation of the edges departing from the Babel synset denoted by the input id
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getTranslations

public com.google.common.collect.Multimap<it.uniroma1.lcl.jlt.util.Language,it.uniroma1.lcl.jlt.util.ScoredItem<java.lang.String>> getTranslations(it.uniroma1.lcl.jlt.util.Language language,

                                                                                                                                            throws java.io.IOException
Gets translations of an input word.

Parameters:
language - the language of the input word.
word - the word whose senses are to be retrieved.
Returns:
the translations of the input words in different languages, each weighted by the number of times the input word was translated as such

java.io.IOException
